Definition at line 95 of file ht32f5xxxx_rstcu.c.

void RSTCU_ClearResetFlag ( RSTCU_RSTF_TypeDef  RSTCU_RSTF)

Clear the specific global reset flag.

Parameters:
RSTCU_RSTF,:specify the reset flag. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • RSTCU_FLAG_SYSRST : Clear system reset flag
  • RSTCU_FLAG_EXTRST : Clear external pin reset flag
  • RSTCU_FLAG_WDTRST : Clear WDT reset flag
  • RSTCU_FLAG_PORST : Clear power on reset flag
Return values:
None

Definition at line 83 of file ht32f5xxxx_rstcu.c.

FlagStatus RSTCU_GetResetFlagStatus ( RSTCU_RSTF_TypeDef  RSTCU_RSTF)

Check whether the specific global reset flag is set or not.

Parameters:
RSTCU_RSTF,:specify the reset flag. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • RSTCU_FLAG_SYSRST : Get system reset flag
  • RSTCU_FLAG_EXTRST : Get external pin reset flag
  • RSTCU_FLAG_WDTRST : Get WDT reset flag
  • RSTCU_FLAG_PORST : Get power on reset flag
Return values:
SETor RESET

void RSTCU_PeripReset ( RSTCU_PeripReset_TypeDef  Reset,
ControlStatus  Cmd 
)

Peripheral reset function.

Parameters:
Reset,:specify the peripheral clock enable bits.
Cmd,:This parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
Return values:
None
